headline: ServiceNow Launches $12 Billion Deal Spree With $7.75 Billion Armis Acquisition
summary: Software group ramps up acquisitions as investors question whether deals are being used to support growth.

headline: Stock Market Hits Record Highs On Nvidia, Google, GDP Data: Weekly Review
summary: In a holiday-shortened market week, the S&P 500 and Dow Jones hit new highs, buoyed by Nvidia, Google and strong economic data.

raw.headline: Stock Market Hits Record Highs On Nvidia, Google, GDP Data: Weekly Review

headline: monday.com: I Was Wrong (Rating Downgrade)
summary: monday.com Ltd. is downgraded to Hold due to disappointing forward revenue guidance for Q4 and FY27. Learn more about MNDY stock here.

headline: ServiceNow signs agreement to acquire Armis for $7.75bn
summary: The acquisition adds Armis’ cyber-physical asset and risk management tools to ServiceNow’s AI-driven security and operations platform.

raw.headline: ServiceNow signs agreement to acquire Armis for $7.75bn
